item.title: About
item.description: hi, I’m Geoffrey Leh√©e, french devOps. My work is full of Python, Django, Linux and Javascript. <3 Open source. toxinu toxinu

item.title: Code
item.description: Below is a short list of projects I have created or worked on. You can find many more recent projects on Github. Sublimall - SublimeText 3 plugin to sync your configuration. ~560 stars Pyhn - Hacker News command line client. ~380 stars Requirements - Python requirements helper. ~300 stars Leselys - Web based RSS reader. ~220 stars Isit - Python environment discoverer. Minne - Links aggregator.
